markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cantorian Reinforcement](/Feats.aspx?ID=2367) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Hobgoblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=268" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 34 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

The life energy that helped create the first hobgoblins is particularly potent in you, protecting you from ongoing maladies. When you succeed at a saving throw against a [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46) or [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), you reduce the stage by 2 (or 1 for a [virulent](/Traits.aspx?ID=162) disease or poison), and when you critically succeed, you reduce the stage by 3 (or 2 for a virulent disease or poison).
name: Cantorian Reinforcement
